author: protolambda
content:
<@!628018527470616606> Great work! Teku is up-to-date with spec, but still in testing against the updated Catalyst, latest work is here: https://github.com/ConsenSys/teku/compare/master...txrx-research:rayonism-merge
Mikhail and me will be working on the devnet setup next week, we have the setup with keystores + custom eth1/eth2 configuration working, but need to document running of the clients more + test deposits. See https://notes.ethereum.org/@protolambda/merge-devnet-setup-guide for info how to configure one yourself. 
Prysm is working on updating to latest spec as well, and you may be able to run that later next week.

author: bridge-bot
content: <sigpaul> Lighthouse is also working on it, we expect to have a working version next week. We only have WSL support at the moment, though.

author: protolambda
content: Office-hour update; I'm dropping the sydney-focused timeslot, to just schedule calls with folks in that timezone directly (not as many, basically Lighthouse + maybe Adrian from Teku).
